{"title": "Firefight", "title_search": "firefight", "title_keyword": "firefight", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/firefight/", "summary": "Firefight is a World War II real-time simulation game with more AI and attention to detail than any other game in its genre to date. Each bullet, shell or piece of shrapnel is modelled in 3D and ricochets realistically off sloping surfaces. Machine gunners will call for ammunition when they're running low and other squad members will rush over with spare ammo if they are carrying any. Wounded men call for medics who will sprint over to administer first aid. Off-board artillery can be called in but will have to fire several ranging shots before the full 8 gun battery opens fire simultaneously.  There are 9 maps to choose from, and each map has eight scenarios. {"title": "Genius", "title_search": "genius", "title_keyword": "genius", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/genius/", "summary": "----------------------------------------------- "The best math game on iPhone!" -----------------------------------------------  Here comes one of the smartest games ever built for App Store: GENIUS! EASY, MEDIUM, and GENIUS. The modes represent the difficulty level. EASY and MEDIUM modes have 10 levels each, whereas GENIUS has unlimited levels. Timing, pointing and penalties all depend on the mode and level you are in. These are explained in Instructions section in the game in detail.  FEATURES:  - Drag & Drop very easy game play!  - UNIQUE FEATURE: Ability to start from MEDIUM or GENIUS modes once you finished previous modes - UNIQUE FEATURE: Every game is randomly generated, yet every game is guaranteed to be SOLVABLE - UNIQUE FEATURE: Genius will show you the solution if you failed to reach the target number  - Save a game and continue later - Resume an interrupted game (by a call) - Unlimited levels once you get to the Genius mode - SHAKE & RESET the game if you are stuck. - Detailed instructions - A detailed DEMO for new players - Local & Global high scores - Contact us right inside the application  HOW TO PLAY:  Details can be found in the game. In summary, Genius will generate puzzles with random numbers for every game. 6 random numbers will be given to you to reach a random 7th (target) number. You will drag these random numbers to play pad and using arithmetic operations, try to reach the target number.  If you can't reach the target number but reach a number in a certain proximity, you will still be able to pass that level, and you will be given an option to see the solution.   Don't hesitate to ask us questions if you have any. Enjoy Genius!
